content.rendered:
[vc_row thb_full_width=”true” thb_row_padding=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1577097331332{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”About Us” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:50px|text_align:center|color:%23000000″ google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1574848110033{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Chief Editor Message” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Dear readers,
We compile every new issue of AT with new vigor and determination to improve the quality of its content and to provide best information to our readers in the field of architecture. We also get wonderful feedback from the readers and some our contributors have submitted very impressive pieces for the magazine.
The official buildings, pubic parks, museums, malls, towers, unique architecture around the world, best architecturally designed cities, relics from past, current trends of modern architecture, futuristic trends in construction, national and international construction projects, recreational and congregational places all are given due space and importance by us.
The beauty of every publication lies in its variety and quality of its contents. All the previous editions of AT bear witness to the fact that we have tried our best to make this magazine full of variety and have enhanced the quality of its contents with every issue.
We aim to cover the events related to architecture and to give profiles of great architects from around the world. We need the contribution of our esteemed readers to realize this aim so that we may add more variety to its contents.

Shameem Zaidi

Chief Editor

s.zaidi@architecturaltimes.news

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”62px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1574848110033{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Editorial Team” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:500%20bold%20regular%3A500%3Anormal”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”62px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1384″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

Chief Eidtor
Shameem Zaidi

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1384″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

Associate Editor
Nadya Zaidi

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1384″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

Assistant Editor
Umber Zaidi

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”62px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1386″ img_size=”200×200″][vc_column_text]

Director Markeing
Taimour Rashid

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1386″ img_size=”200×200″][vc_column_text]

Marketing executive
Owais ali shah

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
